name: Rikhav Infotech
tag_list: website-designing, offshore-outsourcing, search-engine-optimization, 2d-animation, 3d-animation, multimedia, corporate-branding, logo-designing, brochure-designing
overview:
Established in early 2006 with a staff of 8, Rikhav Infotech is now a huge corporation with over 350 workstations, 800 clients, and over 8000 sq feet of office space. Started with only web development services, it now offers full-fledged, comprehensive IT services including Web Designing, Search Engine Optimization, Multimedia Services, Offshore Outsourcing, Graphic Design, and Corporate Branding.

The startling leap and substantial growth of Rikhav Infotech is an outcome of a strategic workforce and core values of the organization. We believe in delivering top-notch services at competitive prices, while striving to be the market leader by adding value to everything we render. With a view to make a difference in the internet space, we highlight on innovative business strategies and creative web solutions, without depreciating the quality.

Our purpose is to equip our client with cutting edge technology and competitive strategies by providing personalized site designs, effective internet marketing tools, and the required buoyancy.
